name: Presence in VR tutorials
description:
This is the prototypes from mine and Zephra's master's thesis about presence in vr when interacting with grapical user interfaces.

We used the Igroup  presence questionnaire http://www.igroup.org/pq/ipq/index.php after each test to evaluate the effects on presence the factors applied to the tutorials.

The project can be found here: https://github.com/Torbjornsson/DATX05-Master_Thesis
